# Net Core Net Framework Containers Docs

## Choosing Between .NET and .NET Framework for Docker Containers

- [Choosing Between .NET and .NET Framework for Docker Containers](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/architecture/microservices/net-core-net-framework-containers/index.md): .NET Microservices Architecture for Containerized .NET Applications | Choosing Between .NET and .NET Framework for Docker Containers
- [General guidance](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/architecture/microservices/net-core-net-framework-containers/general-guidance.md): .NET Microservices Architecture for Containerized .NET Applications | General guidance
- [When to choose .NET for Docker containers](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/architecture/microservices/net-core-net-framework-containers/net-core-container-scenarios.md): .NET Microservices Architecture for Containerized .NET Applications | When to choose .NET for Docker containers
- [When to choose .NET Framework for Docker containers](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/architecture/microservices/net-core-net-framework-containers/net-framework-container-scenarios.md): .NET Microservices Architecture for Containerized .NET Applications | When to choose .NET Framework for Docker containers
- [Decision table: .NET frameworks to use for Docker](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/architecture/microservices/net-core-net-framework-containers/container-framework-choice-factors.md): .NET Microservices Architecture for Containerized .NET Applications | Decision table, .NET implementations to use for Docker
- [What OS to target with .NET containers](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/architecture/microservices/net-core-net-framework-containers/net-container-os-targets.md): .NET Microservices Architecture for Containerized .NET Applications | What OS to target with .NET containers
- [Official .NET Docker images](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/architecture/microservices/net-core-net-framework-containers/official-net-docker-images.md): .NET Microservices Architecture for Containerized .NET Applications | Official .NET Docker images
